ðŸ“– Summary: sn0int is a semi-automatic OSINT framework and package manager written in Rust. It enumerates attack surface by semi-automatically processing public information and mapping the results in a unified format for followup investigations. It is extensible via modules that can be shared through a registry, allowing users to easily add new capabilities.
